page.title: 12TAKING THE DRIVING TEST
page.content: If you want to drive a car, you have to pass a test to show that you are safe on the road. This is what it felt like. September 5th, the big day. I hope I pass -I couldn't stand the jokes at school.The instructor arrives and says,"I know you're good enough to pass, but anything can go wrong on the day." Reluctantly I drive into the test centre; when I see the others waiting I know my feelings are not unique. Off we go -take the third turning on the right, please- missed it! Oh well,the test only cost me twenty pounds. Turn the car here,please -I reckon you could turn a bus here. Hill start, reversing into a side road, Highway code- the test passes in a frenzied whirl. A voice says, "Well,Miss Heyes, I'm pleased to say you passed!" What a relief!
